news.headline: Why Shopify (SHOP) Stock Is Down Today
news.summary: Shares of Shopify (NYSE:SHOP) fell 3.9% in the afternoon session after geopolitical tensions between the U.S. and the European Union escalated. The broader markets adopted a "risk-off" mode, with investors seeking safe-haven assets amidst the uncertainty.
news.article_text:
What Happened?

Shares of e-commerce platform Shopify (NYSE:SHOP) fell 3.9% in the afternoon session after geopolitical tensions between the United States and the European Union escalated, sparking fears of a renewed trade war.
